A JavaScript library for training and deploying ML models in
the browser and on Node.js
Example About Videos
Here is TensorFlow.js in action! When the system is finished training on the open-source MNIST data set it will be able to classify hand written digits. Training of the neural network all takes place right in browser. Within the source code, the training and testing are executed in index.js, while data.js fetches the training and testing data from MNIST one batch at a time.
